class.name: AWA.Wikis.Models.Wiki_View_Info
class.comment: The information about a wiki page.

property.name: read_count
property.comment: the number of times the page was displayed.

property.name: left_side
property.comment: the wiki page left side panel.

property.name: right_side
property.comment: the wiki page right side panel.

property.name: acl_id
property.comment: the acl Id if there is one.

query.name: wiki-page
query.comment: Get the content of a wiki page.
query.sql: SELECT page.id, page.name, page.title, page.is_public, page.last_version, page.read_count, content.create_date, content.format, content.content, content.save_comment, wiki.left_side, wiki.right_side, wiki.format, user.name, acl.id FROM awa_wiki_page AS page INNER JOIN awa_wiki_content AS content ON page.content_id = content.id INNER JOIN awa_wiki_space AS wiki ON page.wiki_id = wiki.id LEFT JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_id = page.wiki_id AND acl.entity_type = :entity_type AND acl.user_id = :user_id AND acl.permission = $permission[wiki-page-view] LEFT JOIN awa_user AS user ON content.author_id = user.id WHERE page.wiki_id = :wiki_id AND page.name = :name

query.name: wiki-page-id
query.comment: Get the content of a wiki page.
query.sql: SELECT page.id, page.name, page.title, page.is_public, page.last_version, page.read_count, content.create_date, content.format, content.content, content.save_comment, wiki.left_side, wiki.right_side, wiki.format, user.name, acl.id FROM awa_wiki_page AS page INNER JOIN awa_wiki_content AS content ON page.content_id = content.id INNER JOIN awa_wiki_space AS wiki ON page.wiki_id = wiki.id LEFT JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_id = page.wiki_id AND acl.entity_type = :entity_type AND acl.user_id = :user_id AND acl.permission = $permission[wiki-page-view] LEFT JOIN awa_user AS user ON content.author_id = user.id WHERE page.wiki_id = :wiki_id AND page.id = :id

query.name: wiki-page-content
query.comment: Get only the content of a wiki page (for template evaluation).
query.sql: SELECT content.content FROM awa_wiki_page AS page INNER JOIN awa_wiki_content AS content ON page.content_id = content.id WHERE page.wiki_id = :wiki_id AND page.name = :name

query.name: wiki-page-name-count
query.comment: Count the occurence of a wiki page name
query.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM awa_wiki_page WHERE name = :name AND wiki_id = :wiki_id AND id != :id
